name: Super Sheridan 64
description:
Super Sheridan 64 is a midterm assignment from PROG 50102 Game Engine Fundamentals course at Sheridan college.

The gameplay consists of moving a character around the screen with WASD, jumping with space and turning the camera by right clicking and dragging. 

The objective of the game is to navigate to the end of the level and collect the cube. The player can collect coins along the way to increase their score. If the player falls off the stage, they will be presented with a game over screen and can restart the game from the title screen.
